item.title: RWE 将在德国沿海建造两个风电场
item.description: 德国最大的电力生产商 RWE AG 不顾供应链方面的持续挑战，做出了在北海建设 1.6 千兆瓦海上风力发电能力的最终投资决定。【原文：Germany’s largest power producer RWE AG took the final investment decision to construct 1.6 gigawatts of offshore wind capacity in the North Sea, despite persistent supply-chain challenges.】

item.title: Discovery 以更低利率进军南非房贷市场
item.description: Discovery Ltd.的银行部门正在南非推出一款房贷产品，通过其活力奖励计划，客户可以少付高达 1%的房贷，并动态降低利息还款额。【原文：Discovery Ltd.’s banking unit is rolling out a mortgage product in South Africa that will enable clients to pay as much as 1% less on their home loans and lower interest repayments dynamically through its Vitality rewards program.】

item.title: 马克龙和肖尔茨计划联合推动加强欧洲防空能力
item.description: 在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰之后，欧洲人受到压力，要求他们对自身安全做出承诺，法国和德国将于本周公布加强合作的计划，以加强欧洲的防空能力。【原文：France and Germany are aiming to unveil plans this week for closer cooperation to strengthen Europe’s air defenses as they respond to pressure for Europeans to commit to their own security after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 现代汽车为可能创纪录的印度 IPO 增加更多银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，现代汽车公司已邀请科塔克-马恒达银行有限公司（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. ）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）担任其印度分公司潜在首次公开募股的顾问，因为该汽车制造商正在考虑在这个南亚国家进行有史以来规模最大的一次上市。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. has brought in Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. and Morgan Stanley as advisers on a potential initial public offering of its India unit, according to people familiar with the matter, as the automaker considers what might be one of the biggest-ever listings in the South Asian country.】

item.title: 德国商业前景改善，经济势头增强
item.description: 德国的商业前景连续第四个月上升，因为人们对该国经济的反弹将在今年余下的时间里得到加强充满信心。【原文：Germany’s business outlook rose for a fourth month as confidence builds that the country’s economic rebound will strengthen over the rest of the year.】

item.title: 国际金融公司为南非 FirstRand 公司提供 2.5 亿美元绿色住房贷款
item.description: 世界银行的私人投资部门将向南非贷款机构 FirstRand Ltd. 提供 2.5 亿美元贷款，以帮助增加绿色建筑贷款。【原文：The World Bank’s private investment arm will provide a $250 million loan to South African lender FirstRand Ltd. to help boost loans for green buildings.】

item.title: 加密货币交易商关注以太币创纪录以及美国 ETF 炒作带来的波动性上升
item.description: 在美国监管机构出人意料地转向允许数字资产交易所交易基金之后，人们对以太币涨势的押注正在加剧，尽管人们对这种产品的需求强度还存有疑问。【原文：Bets on more Ether gains are intensifying following a surprise US regulatory pivot toward allowing exchange-traded funds for the digital asset, even as questions swirl about the strength of demand for the products.】

item.title: 英美休市，欧洲股市交投清淡
item.description: 欧洲股市在清淡的交易日中基本持平，英国和美国市场因假期休市。【原文：European stocks were largely flat in a light trading day with markets in the UK and US closed for holidays.】

item.title: 基金看淡中国股市为反弹留有余地
item.description: 策略师们表示，今年全球基金对中国股票的持股比例仍然偏低，这为他们在经济前景改善时增持中国股票铺平了道路。【原文：Global funds have retained a small underweight allocation on Chinese shares this year, paving the way for them to boost their holdings as the economic outlook improves, strategists say.】

item.title: 监督机构称瑞典金融稳定性前景有所改善
item.description: 瑞典金融监督机构表示，随着通胀放缓和央行开始放宽货币政策，瑞典的金融稳定前景有所改善。【原文：Sweden’s outlook for financial stability has improved somewhat as inflation has slowed and the central bank has started to ease monetary policy, the country’s financial watchdog said.】

item.title: 大亨家族放弃对非洲零售商 Pick n Pay 的控制权
item.description: 阿克曼家族将退出 Pick n Pay Stores Ltd. 的大股东之位，这家南非第三大杂货商正在进行重组。【原文：The Ackerman family is stepping aside as the majority shareholder of Pick n Pay Stores Ltd. amid a revamp of South Africa’s third-largest grocer by revenue.】

item.title: 日本央行发出信号：价格标准发生变化后仍有加息空间
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）和他的副手表示，现在日本已经摆脱了 0% 的通胀标准，有逐步提高利率的空间。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda and his deputy indicated there is scope for gradually raising interest rates now that the nation has shifted away from an inflation norm of 0%.】

item.title: 韩国卖空监控系统可能在第一季度准备就绪
item.description: 韩国金融监督管理局局长李福贤（Lee Bokhyun）周一表示，韩国将有可能在明年第一季度完成一个检测非法卖空的系统。【原文：South Korea will likely be able to complete a system to detect illegal short selling in the first quarter of next year, Financial Supervisory Service Governor Lee Bokhyun said on Monday.】

item.title: 印度债券是摩根大通资产纳入前的最佳亚洲投资选择
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司增持了印度本币主权债券，将其视为亚洲同行中的最佳选择。【原文：JPMorgan Asset Management increased its holdings of Indian local-currency sovereign bonds, viewing them as the best bet among peers in Asia.】

item.title: 中国加大刺激力度，5 月迄今已销售 1,090 亿美元地方政府债券
item.description: 中国 5 月份的地方政府债券发行量达到 7 个月来的最高水平，这表明政府正在加大财政刺激力度以支持经济。【原文：China’s issuance of local government bonds in May reached the most in seven months, a sign that authorities are ramping up fiscal stimulus to support the economy.】

item.title: 莱恩称欧洲央行全年都需要采取限制性措施
item.description: 欧洲央行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲央行有望在下个月开始降息，但需要将政策保持在限制性区域直至 2024 年。【原文：The European Central Bank is on track to start cutting interest rates next month, but will need to keep policy in restrictive territory through 2024, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: CFTC 数据显示美国经济数据降温，美元多头退却
item.description: 由于有迹象表明美国经济正在降温，对美元的看涨情绪正在迅速消退，一些投资者六周来首次持有净空头头寸。【原文：Bullish sentiment on the dollar is rapidly receding amid signs the US economy is cooling, with a group of investors holding a net short position for the first time in six weeks.】

item.title: 澳大利亚的激进主义运动不断升温，迎来有史以来最繁忙的开端
item.description: 澳大利亚投资者参与激进主义的程度超过了十多年来的任何时候，因为积极的活动激增，公司屈服于激进股东的压力。【原文：Australian investors are more engaged in activism than at any time in more than a decade as active campaigns surge and companies bow to pressure from agitating shareholders.】

item.title: 中国建筑商凯撒获得更多重组时间
item.description: 周一，香港一家法院将针对中国开发商凯撒集团控股有限公司（Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd.）的清盘呈请的听证会延期至 6 月 24 日，给这家陷入困境的公司更多时间来达成债务协议。【原文：A Hong Kong court adjourned to June 24 a hearing on a winding-up petition against Chinese developer Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd. on Monday, giving the struggling firm more time to work on a debt agreement.】

item.title: 海外需求改善，中国工业利润上升
item.description: 由于当月出口恢复增长，中国工业企业的利润在 4 月份出现增长，从而推动了经济的发展。【原文：Profits at China’s industrial companies rose in April as exports returned to growth in the same month, giving a boost to the economy.】

item.title: 前日本央行行长马赛称日本央行可能在年底前加息至 0.5
item.description: 日本央行政策委员会的一位前成员表示，如果经济状况大致保持不变，日本央行有可能在年底前将基准利率上调至 0.5%。【原文：Japan’s central bank has scope to hike its benchmark rate to as high as 0.5% by the end of the year if economic conditions stay more or less on the same track, according to a former member of the Bank of Japan’s policy board.】

item.title: 中国铜产量接近历史最高水平，抵御全球铜业挤压
item.description: 全球铜市场正被短缺的担忧所笼罩，铜价因此屡创新高，并引发了一场价值 490 亿美元的收购战。但在全球最大的精炼金属生产国和消费国中国，铜的供应却绰绰有余。【原文：The global copper market is gripped by fears of a shortage, which has propelled prices to record levels and sparked a $49 billion takeover battle. But in China, the world’s biggest producer and consumer of the refined metal, there’s more than enough to go around.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 美国议员访问台湾。亚洲首富进军非洲。七国集团成员围攻中国出口。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：US lawmakers visit Taiwan. Asia’s richest man branches out to Africa. G-7 members round on Chinese exports. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 石油接近三个月低点，欧佩克+供应和美国需求成为焦点
item.description: 石油价格在创下四周以来最大单周跌幅后趋于稳定，市场关注的焦点是周日举行的欧佩克+供应会议和夏季驾车季节开始时美国的需求。【原文：Oil steadied after its biggest weekly loss in four, with the focus on an OPEC+ supply meeting on Sunday and US demand at the start of the summer driving season.】

item.title: 房贷压力增大，英国人购买计划外房屋的数量减少
item.description: 利率上调导致英国计划外房屋销售下滑，促使全国的房屋建筑商缩减开发规模。【原文：Higher interest rates have caused off-plan home sales to tumble in the UK, prompting the nation’s housebuilders to scale back development.】

item.title: 印度炎炎夏日为这些股票带来盈利增长
item.description: 炎热的夏季笼罩着印度的大部分地区，这使人们对印度 4.8 万亿美元股票市场中的一个板块的盈利增长持乐观态度。【原文：A blistering summer gripping a significant portion of India is fueling optimism of higher earnings for one segment of the nation’s $4.8 trillion stock market.】

item.title: 风险情绪回升，亚洲股市将攀升：市场综述
item.description: 在美国消费者调低通胀预期、美联储今年可能有降息空间之后，亚洲股市将追随美国股市走高。【原文：Asian stocks are set to follow their US peers higher after American consumers tempered inflation expectations, bolstering sentiment the Federal Reserve may have room to cut rates this year.】

item.title: 期权波动率被压得喘不过气来，未来几乎没有缓解的余地
item.description: 波动性正在被击垮。无处不在。【原文：Volatility is getting crushed. Everywhere.】

item.title: 中国住房救助在试点城市的记录不佳
item.description: 中国的大型住房救援行动旨在加强已在进行的小规模努力--这些努力正在努力获得牵引力。【原文：China’s big housing rescue aims to build on smaller efforts that are already under way – and struggling to get traction.】
